title: Hallstar Opens New Suzhou, China Research Center to Drive Breakthrough Innovation in Specialty Chemistry
text: Tuesday, August 18, 2015 11:22AM IST (5:52AM GMT) (BW)(IL-HALLSTAR) Hallstar Opens New Suzhou, China Research Center to Drive Breakthrough Innovation in Specialty Chemistry • State-of-the-art center represents a major leap in Hallstar’s research presence.• New facility will help Hallstar anticipate customers’ wants and needs in the beauty and personal care and industrial marketplaces.• The Center’s location will also provide Asia Pacific customers with timely and customized product support. Chicago, United States Hallstar, a leading global specialty chemical company headquartered in Chicago, announced today the official opening of a new state-of-the-art facility in Suzhou, China. The Hallstar New Material Science & Technology (Suzhou) Company Ltd will serve as an R&D and technical support base in the Asia Pacific region. In the near future, sales, service and logistics support will also operate out of the facility. “Hallstar’s major investment in this facility will create an innovation ecosystem crucial to our success. The facility, and the larger technology center of which it is a part, provides geographic proximity to our customers and as well as access to the latest advances in science and technology in the region,” said John Paro, Chairman, President, and CEO of Hallstar. Hallstar New Material Science & Technology (Suzhou) Company Ltd will conduct advanced research for applications in two core markets. For the beauty and personal care market, this will include sun protection, anti-aging, whitening and new ingredients that mimic the natural functions of the skin. For the industrial additives market, this will include polymer plasticizing, surface enhancement and processing improvements. A significant portion of the work done at the facility will be based on green and renewable chemistry. As Hallstar continues to grow across Asia Pacific, it expects the new facility to further strengthen its market position and enable it to better serve the region. The localization and expansion of Hallstar’s research capabilities is another example of commitment to its global growth strategy. About Hallstar: Hallstar is a leading global provider of specialty chemistry solutions. The company takes a collaborative approach to every engagement, delivering technical support, chemistry expertise and industry knowledge that helps its customers make the most of their products, from concepts to the first production batches. To learn more visit www.hallstar.com .
